explains: n. 复制，复印；重复；成倍，成双；副本，复制品；（染色体中DNA的）重复段

sentences.en: There could be a serious loss of efficiency through unnecessary duplication of resources.
sentences.cn: 不必要的资源重复会导致严重的效率损耗。

sentences.en: It turns out, though, that there are various degrees of genetic duplication.
sentences.cn: 然而，事实证明，有不同程度的基因复制。

sentences.en: Little reward accompanies duplication and confirmation of what is already known and believed.
sentences.cn: 重复和确认人们已经熟知和确信的事情是没有意义的。
